text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.18.Rabies"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.18.Rabies

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.18.Rabies

title: IMMZ.DT.18.Rabies

status: draft

date: 2023-08-09 14:35:53+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If patient has not been vaccinated, give Rabies vaccine

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT18

action

title: Immunize Patient for Rabies (PrEP strategy) - No Doses

description: Provide Rabies immunizations – using the "PrEP vaccination strategy – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Rabies vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine (PrEP strategy) on 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Individual is at high risk of RABV exposure" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine (PrEP strategy) on 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.18.Rabies.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Rabies (PrEP strategy) - 1 Dose

description: Provide Rabies immunizations – using the "PrEP vaccination strategy – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Rabies vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine (PrEP strategy) on 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Rabies dose given" >= "7 days"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine (PrEP strategy) on 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.18.Rabies.02

action

title: Immunize Patient for Rabies vaccine Booster (PrEP strategy)

description: Provide Rabies immunizations – using the "PrEP vaccination strategy – BOOSTER" schedule (1 dose booster)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Individual has continual or frequent risk of exposure (i.e. occupational)" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine Booster (PrEP strategy)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"VNA levels" < "0.5 IU/mL"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Rabies vaccine Booster (PrEP strategy)

definition: IMMZ.DT.18.Rabies.03
